solution_line_template: He's inviting {num_guests} guests and will need {pounds_per_person} pounds per person so he will need {num_guests}*{pounds_per_person} = <<{num_guests}*{pounds_per_person}={total_pounds_needed}>>{total_pounds_needed} pounds of ice

Ice is sold in {pounds_per_bag}-pound bags and he needs {total_pounds_needed} pounds so he will need {total_pounds_needed}/{pounds_per_bag} = <<{total_pounds_needed}/{pounds_per_bag}={num_bags_needed}>>{num_bags_needed} bags of ice
Each bag is ${cost_per_bag} and he needs {num_bags_needed} bags so they will cost {num_bags_needed}*{cost_per_bag} = $<<{num_bags_needed}*{cost_per_bag}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
